: BrightBlade doesn�t react in time to see Rex turn and shoot her, instead 
she is blown against she sealed door with a bang.
However, her cloaking device was undamaged and still hid her from sight, and 
scanners.
She shook herself and then looked towards Rex, wondering just whom he 
thought he was firing at her like that, especially when she planned to spare 
his life.:

� What are you doing?�

: Her voice echoed through the room.:

� I�m sparing you, stop firing!�

: But she knew deep down in her spark that he wouldn�t, and that she might 
even be forced to slag him�but not to the point of death.
BrightBlade then thought about something that she hadn�t thought about in a 
while: Gangon.
How was he, was he alive still?
She just hoped that he could hold on just a bit more, and where in the Pit 
was that Perndabot?!!
BrightBlade looked down at her leg compartment and wondered if she had a 
transmission cloaker as well, remembering that it must have been her earlier 
transmission that had set off everything.
She reached into the compartment and finally felt what she was looking for, 
it wasn�t a cloaker like she had hoped, but it was the next best thing.
A rickishay transmitter.
It sent a transmission, yes, but it made it seem almost as if it was coming 
from every direction possible!
She smiled to herself and activated the communicator.:

� Perndabot��, she whispered into it. � I�m in the brig CR chamber room, get 
you butt down here. The location is 152. I need your help.�

: And with that she ended it, her eyes then looking towards Rex to see just 
what he was going to do next.:
